item.title: 马斯克与特朗普争吵后，特斯拉卖空者获利约 40 亿美元
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普与特斯拉首席执行官埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）之间的公开争吵导致特斯拉股价创下有史以来最大单日跌幅后，交易商周四从特斯拉股票空头头寸中获利 40 亿美元。【原文：Traders raked in $4 billion in profit from their short positions in Tesla shares on Thursday after a public feud between President Donald Trump and CEO Elon Musk led to the stock's biggest single-day drop ever.】

item.title: 德国默茨公司希望在特朗普会谈后建立汽车关税抵消机制
item.description: 德国总理弗里德里希-默茨（Friedrich Merz）周五表示，他将寻求达成一项协议，即美国汽车可以免税进口到欧洲，以换取同样数量的出口到美国的汽车的关税减免。【原文：German Chancellor Friedrich Merz said on Friday that he would pursue a deal under which U.S. cars could be imported into Europe duty free in exchange for tariff waivers on the same number of vehicles exported to the U.S.】

item.title: 博通股价下跌，原因是营收预期不尽如人意
item.description: 博通（Broadcom）股价在周五的盘前交易中下跌近 4%，此前该公司的第三季度营收预期未能打动在人工智能热潮中极度看好芯片股的投资者。【原文：Broadcom shares fell nearly 4% in premarket trading on Friday, after the company's third-quarter revenue forecast failed to impress investors who have been extremely bullish on chip stocks amid an artificial intelligence boom.】

item.title: 消息人士称，马斯克的 "星链 "公司从印度电信部获得关键许可证
item.description: 知情人士周五告诉路透社，埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）的Starlink公司已获得印度电信部颁发的关键许可证，为这家卫星供应商扫清了一大障碍，使其离在印度开展商业运营更近了一步。【原文：Elon Musk's Starlink has received a key licence from India's telecoms ministry, sources with knowledge of the matter told Reuters on Friday, clearing a major hurdle for the satellite provider and taking it closer to launching commercial operations in India.】

item.title: 瑞士法郎走强为何可能导致其重回负利率水平
item.description: 瑞士可能成为首个恢复负利率以应对货币飙升和物价下跌的大型经济体，这凸显出在全球贸易战持续发酵的背景下，央行可能很快就会耗尽常规政策工具。【原文：Switzerland could be the first big economy to return to negative interest rates to fight a surging currency and falling prices, highlighting how quickly central bankers may be running out of conventional policy tools as a global trade war rages on.】

item.title: 西班牙对委内瑞拉石油的进口在美国制裁截止日期前枯竭
item.description: 在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）政府设定的关键制裁期限之前，西班牙在四月份没有从委内瑞拉进口原油。【原文：Spain didn't import crude oil from Venezuela in April, ahead of a key sanctions deadline set by U.S. President Donald Trump's administration.】

item.title: 五月份世界粮食价格下降，谷物、糖和蔬菜价格下跌
item.description: 联合国粮食及农业组织周五表示，受谷物、糖和植物油价格明显下跌的影响，5月份全球粮食商品价格有所下降。【原文：Global food commodity prices declined in May, driven by marked drops in cereal, sugar, and vegetable oil prices, the United Nations' Food and Agriculture Organization said on Friday.】

item.title: 中国稀土武器改变贸易战战场轮廓
item.description: 最近几周争夺稀土出口许可证的行为表明，中国已设计出一种更好、目标更明确的贸易战武器。【原文：The scramble in recent weeks to secure export licences for rare earths shows China has devised a better, more precisely targeted weapon for trade war.】

item.title: 日本前最高外汇外交官预计年底前日元将升至140附近
item.description: 日本前最高货币外交官周五表示，美日利率差距的缩小，而不是美国总统唐纳德-特朗普削弱美元的任何努力，将有可能使日元兑美元汇率在年底前升至135-140左右。【原文：A narrowing U.S.-Japan interest rate gap, rather than any effort by President Donald Trump to weaken the dollar, will likely lift the yen to around 135-140 against the U.S. unit by year-end, Japan's former top currency diplomat said on Friday.】

item.title: 亚洲股市迎来 15 个月来最大单月外资流入量
item.description: 5 月份，亚洲股市吸引了强劲的外资流入，因为市场对美国提高关税会对经济造成直接冲击的担忧有所缓解，这促使此前退出该地区大额集中头寸的投资者回流。【原文：Asian equities attracted strong foreign inflows in May as concerns over an immediate economic hit from higher U.S. tariffs eased, prompting a return by investors who had previously exited large and concentrated positions in the region.】

item.title: 卫星公司 SES 聘用航空业资深人士担任新任财务总监
item.description: 欧洲卫星公司 SES 周五表示，已任命 Elisabeth Pataki 为新任财务总监。【原文：SES has appointed Elisabeth Pataki as its new finance chief, the European satellite company said on Friday.】

item.title: 穆迪将日产企业家族评级下调至 Ba2
item.description: 全球评级机构穆迪（Moody's）周五将日产汽车公司的企业家族评级从Ba1下调至Ba2，这家陷入困境的日本汽车制造商正努力推动扭亏为盈。【原文：Global ratings agency Moody's on Friday cut Nissan Motor Co Ltd's corporate family rating to Ba2 from Ba1, as the embattled Japanese automaker seeks to push through a turnaround.】

item.title: 政治报》报道马斯克与白宫将举行电话会议，特斯拉股价上涨
item.description: 上周五，在法兰克福上市的特斯拉股票上涨了 5.6%，此前 Politico 报道称，白宫助手已安排与首席执行官埃隆-马斯克通话，以便在与美国总统唐纳德-特朗普公开交恶后促成和平。【原文：Tesla shares listed in Frankfurt rose 5.6% on Friday after Politico reported White House aides have scheduled a call with CEO Elon Musk to broker peace after a public feud with U.S. President Donald Trump.】

item.title: 贸易不确定性导致中国 5 月出口可能放缓 - 路透社调查
item.description: 尽管美国降低了对中国商品的关税，但由于贸易战余波未了以及中美关系的不确定性影响了出货量，中国 5 月份的出口增长可能有所放缓。【原文：Growth in China's exports likely slowed in May despite a lowering of U.S. tariffs on Chinese goods, as the fallout from the still-unresolved trade war and uncertainties in Sino-U.S. ties weighed on shipments.】

item.title: 法国达索系统公司将盈利目标推迟至 2029 年
item.description: 法国软件公司达索系统（Dassault Systemes）周五将中期每股收益（EPS）预测的目标期限延长了一年，而此时汽车需求疲软和关税带来的不确定性正对其业务造成压力。【原文：French software company Dassault Systemes extended the target period of its medium-term earnings per share (EPS) forecast by one year on Friday, at a time when weak auto demand and tariff-driven uncertainty weigh on its business.】

item.title: 瑞士国家银行被列入美国观察名单后否认操纵货币
item.description: 在美国将瑞士列入因不公平货币和贸易行为而受到监控的国家名单之后，瑞士央行周五表示，瑞士国家银行没有参与货币操纵。【原文：The Swiss National Bank does not engage in currency manipulation, the central bank said on Friday, after the United States added Switzerland to a list of countries being monitored for unfair currency and trade practices.】

item.title: 早间竞价特朗普与马斯克的争吵震撼了薪资前市场
item.description: Stella Qiu 对欧洲和全球市场未来一天的展望【原文：A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Stella Qiu】

item.title: 对市场而言，欧洲央行降息的终点越来越近了
item.description: 由于欧洲央行认为自己有能力应对美国关税政策引发的全球经济不确定性，交易员们对欧洲央行暂停降息的信心与日俱增。【原文：Traders are increasingly confident the European Central Bank will pause its run of interest rate cuts now that the central bank sees itself as well-positioned to deal with global economic uncertainty fuelled by U.S. tariff policy.】

item.title: 预计美国 5 月就业增长缓慢；失业率保持稳定
item.description: 由于企业在关税不确定性的逆风中挣扎，5 月份美国的就业增长可能大幅放缓，但可能还不足以让谨慎的美联储很快恢复降息。【原文：U.S. job growth likely slowed considerably in May as businesses struggled with headwinds from tariff uncertainty, but probably not enough for a cautious Federal Reserve to resume cutting interest rates anytime soon.】

item.title: 特朗普与马斯克的 "兄弟情 "演变为合同和弹劾问题上的争吵
item.description: 如果两人长期不和，导致马斯克失去竞选开支，或削弱硅谷对特朗普的支持，共和党在明年的中期选举中就更难保住国会控制权。【原文：A prolonged feud between the pair could make it harder for Republicans to keep control of Congress in next year's midterm elections if it leads to a loss of Musk's campaign spending or erodes support for Trump in Silicon Valley.】

item.title: 台湾和硕表示已进入评估美国工厂计划的最后阶段
item.description: 苹果和戴尔的主要供应商和硕联合公司（Pegatron）总裁兼首席执行官郑匡志周五告诉股东们，该公司对其美国工厂计划的评估已进入最后阶段，并将于本月或下月公布决定。【原文：Key Apple and Dell supplier Pegatron is in the final stage of evaluating its U.S. factory plan and is set to unveil a decision this month or next, its president and CEO Kuang-Chih Cheng told shareholders on Friday.】

item.title: 据彭博新闻社报道，印尼财富基金考虑入股 Grab-GoTo 交易
item.description: 据彭博新闻社周五报道，新成立的主权财富基金印尼达纳塔拉公司（Danantara Indonesia）正在与GoTo公司进行早期谈判，以在美国上市的竞争对手Grab可能对该打车和食品配送公司的收购中分一杯羹。【原文：Newly-launched sovereign wealth fund Danantara Indonesia is in early talks with GoTo to get a piece of U.S.-listed rival Grab's potential buyout of the ride-hailing and food delivery firm, Bloomberg News reported on Friday.】

item.title: 在竞争日益激烈的情况下，MercadoLibre 在顶级市场巴西扩大免费送货范围
item.description: 拉美电子商务巨头 MercadoLibre 周五表示，将在其主要市场巴西扩大免费送货范围，预计此举成本高昂，但该公司希望此举能在激烈的竞争中推动销售额增长。【原文：Latin American e-commerce giant MercadoLibre is expanding free shipping in its main market Brazil, it said on Friday, a move expected to be costly but which the company hopes will drive sales higher amid fierce competition.】

item.title: 中美重启贸易谈判，油价有望实现稳健的周涨幅
item.description: 在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普和中国国家主席习近平重启贸易谈判后，油价周五有所下滑，但有望实现三周来的首次单周上涨，这为世界两大经济体的增长和需求强劲带来了希望。【原文：Oil prices slipped on Friday but were on track for their first weekly gain in three weeks after U.S. President Donald Trump and China's Xi Jinping resumed trade talks, raising hopes for growth and stronger demand in the world's two largest economies.】

item.title: 股市警惕非农数据，特斯拉暴跌，特朗普与马斯克关系变差
item.description: 周五，亚洲股市低迷，因为投资者都在等待重要的就业报告，而特斯拉则因美国总统唐纳德-特朗普和亿万富翁埃隆-马斯克之间公开的不和而蒙受巨大损失。【原文：Asian shares were subdued on Friday as investors hunkered down for the all-important payrolls report, while Tesla suffered huge losses on the very public feud between President Donald Trump and billionaire Elon Musk.】

item.title: 美元受困于美国经济疲软和贸易困境
item.description: 由于美国经济出现脆弱迹象，以及华盛顿与其贸易伙伴之间的贸易谈判在最后期限即将到来之际仍进展甚微，美元汇率在周五遭遇了一周来的最大跌幅。【原文：The dollar was headed for a weekly loss on Friday, undermined by signs of fragility in the U.S. economy and as trade negotiations between Washington and its trading partners made little progress despite a looming deadline.】

item.title: 马斯克称 SpaceX 不会让 "龙 "退役
item.description: 亿万富翁埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）周四表示，在他与美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的争执升级之际，他的火箭公司 SpaceX 将开始退役龙飞船（Dragon spacecraft）。【原文：Billionaire Elon Musk said on Thursday that his rocket company SpaceX will not decommission its Dragon spacecraft just hours after stating that the company would begin decommissioning amid his escalating feud with U.S. President Donald Trump.】

item.title: 亚马逊将投资超过 50 亿美元在台湾新建 AWS 区域
item.description: 亚马逊周四宣布启动亚马逊网络服务（AWS）亚太（台北）地区，并计划投资 50 多亿美元支持其在台湾的数据中心的建设、连接、运营和维护。【原文：Amazon announced the launch of the Amazon Web Services (AWS) Asia Pacific (Taipei) Region on Thursday, along with plans to invest more than $5 billion to support the construction, connection, operation, and maintenance of its data centers in Taiwan.】

item.title: 亚马逊裁员更多，这次是图书部门
item.description: 亚马逊周四表示，该公司已经裁减了图书部门的工作岗位，包括 Goodreads 评论网站和 Kindle 部门。【原文：Amazon has cut jobs in its books division, including at its Goodreads review site and Kindle units, the company said on Thursday.】

item.title: OpenAI 将就《纽约时报》的诉讼要求提起上诉，要求不删除任何用户聊天记录
item.description: OpenAI 周四表示，它正在对《纽约时报》要求 ChatGPT 制造商无限期保留消费者 ChatGPT 和 API 客户数据的诉讼提起上诉。【原文：OpenAI said on Thursday that it is appealing The New York Times' lawsuit demanding that the ChatGPT-maker retain consumer ChatGPT and API customer data indefinitely.】
